oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Louisiana Hayride - 1958-09-27 - KWKH
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Excerpt from a Louisiana Hayride radio program segment, featuring Norm Bale (announcer), Frank Page (announcer, host), Ferlin Husky (performer), Margie Singleton (performer), Charlie Walker (performer), Tony Douglas (performer), and Dobber Johnson (performer) on September 27, 1958 on radio station KWKH (Shreveport, La.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ferlin Husky; Margie Singleton; Charlie Walker; Tony Douglas; Dobber Johnson;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Test tones -- Opening theme -- Opening statement (Norm Bale) -- Opening statement (Frank Page) -- Frank Page introduces Ferlin Husky -- I Will (Ferlin Husky) -- Husky and Page talk -- I Feel Better All Over (Ferlin Husky) -- Page introduces Margie Singleton -- I Can't Help Wondering (Margie Singleton) -- Page introduces Charlie Walker -- Charlie Walker talks -- Pick Me Up On Your Way Down (Charlie Walker) -- Tell Her Lies And Feed Her Candy (Charlie Walker) -- Page introduces Tony Douglas -- World In My Arms (Tony Douglas) -- Page introduces Simon Crum (Ferlin Husky) -- Cuzz Yore So Sweet (Ferlin Husky as Simon Crum) -- Country Music Is Here To Stay (Ferlin Husky as Simon Crum) -- Bill Cheatham (Dobber Johnson fiddle)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Louisiana hayride (Radio program); KWKH (Radio station : Shreveport, La.); Page, Frank; Bale, Norm; Husky, Ferlin; Singleton, Margie; Walker, Charlie, 1926-2008; Douglas, Tony;
